textBox.richText: While we still have a few lingering issues with 1.5, overall it is stable and we are pleased with its progress. Therefore to celebrate that fact, we are giving you the public release of iWeb Buddy 1.5. You can download the latest from here. This release focuses on the connectivity issues that some users have experienced. Please enjoy this release of iWeb Buddy and report any issues you may find on our new support forum at http://help.zarrastudios.com.
